item.title: Volvo NH12 by paulo junior 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 29, 2025

Volvo NH12 by paulo junior 1.53 ETS2

The Volvo NH12 by Paulo Junior mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 adds a classic long-nose Volvo truck with a distinctive Brazilian style. It features high-quality exterior and interior models, realistic engine sounds, detailed animations, and smooth driving physics. The mod includes customization options, such as chassis types, paint jobs, and accessories. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for fans of vintage Volvo trucks looking for a powerful and immersive driving experience.

Credits: paulo junior classe a

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Volvo FH 2018 BY PAULO JUNIOR 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 29, 2025

Volvo FH 2018 BY PAULO JUNIOR 1.53 ETS2

The Volvo FH 2018 by Paulo Junior mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 brings a modern and detailed version of the Volvo FH with a Brazilian touch. It features high-quality exterior and interior models, realistic engine sounds, smooth driving physics, and fully functional dashboard elements. The mod offers customization options such as chassis types, paint jobs, tuning parts, and lighting. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, it’s perfect for players seeking a stylish and powerful Volvo truck experience.

Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 29, 2025

IVECO 410 BY PAULO JUNIOR 1.53 ETS2

The IVECO 410 by Paulo Junior mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 adds a realistic and powerful Brazilian-style Iveco truck to the game. It features high-quality 3D models, a detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and smooth driving physics. The mod includes customization options such as chassis configurations, paint jobs, accessories, and lighting. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for fans of Iveco trucks looking for an immersive and authentic South American trucking experience.

item.title: Mapa Ceibo ARG URU 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 29, 2025

Mapa Ceibo ARG URU 1.53 ETS2

The Mapa Ceibo ARG/URU mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 adds a highly detailed and realistic map of Argentina and Uruguay to the game. It features authentic roads, cities, landscapes, and landmarks, capturing the unique driving experience of South America. The map includes custom models, realistic traffic, challenging routes, and is fully compatible with ETS2 1.53. Perfect for players who want to explore new territories and enjoy immersive trucking through the heart of Argentina and Uruguay.

Credits: qra sol

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder.
